text: #BREAKING : Drugs Controller General of India (DGCI) approves emergency use for #Zydus Cadila's Pegylated Interferon alpha-2b, ‘Virafin’ for treating moderate #COVID19 infection in adults. #CoronavirusIndia #COVIDEmergency2021 #COVID19Vaccine #vaccine #CoronaVirus #COVID https://t.co/7LUgCX0N3D
